text: Evaṃ bhāvitā kho bhikkhave cattāro satipaṭṭhānā evaṃ bahulīkatā satta sambojjhaṅge paripūrenti
edit: Evaṃ bhāvitā kho bhikkhave cattāro satipaṭṭhānā evaṃ bahulīkatā satta sambojjhaṅge paripūrenti

translations.transtext: In that way, monks, the four foundations of mindfulness was cultivated. In that way, having been practiced frequently, [they] fulfill the seven factors of enlightenment.
